Philly's Center City District posted a list of restaurants and bars participating in Philly's 2024 [CCD Sips](https://centercityphila.org/explore-center-city/ccd-sips/sips-list-view). CCD Sips is a series of summer Wednesday evenings (5-7pm) filled with **happy hour specials**, between June 5th and August 28th.

I'm in the process of creating this year's map!

In the meantime, you can take a look at CCD Sips maps from [2023](/blog/2023-06-05-ccd-sips), [2022](/blog/2022-05-31-ccd-sips) and [2019](/blog/2019-08-04-ccd-sips).

To receive an e-mail update when the map goes live (and whenever I create a post), subscribe to my free newsletter on Substack.
